format: JavaScript (React testing using Testing Library and Jest)
description: This file contains smoke tests for authentication pages in a React frontend application, verifying rendering of login and register pages and handling of login button click events.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Resets local storage token and fetch mock before each test.

methods.name: afterAll
methods.description: Restores fetch mock after all tests have run.

methods.name: Login form fields render
methods.description: Tests rendering of login form elements and heading.

methods.name: Register form fields render
methods.description: Tests rendering of registration form elements and heading.

methods.name: Login button click does not crash without mocked network
methods.description: Simulates clicking the login button and checks it exists.
